title: Facing myriad global pressures, Iran intensifies outreach to African partners for critical needs
description: Iran has sought to bolster its economic and security relationships on the continent after a punishing year both at home and in the Middle East.
content:
Prime Minister of Ethiopia Abiy Ahmed shakes hands with Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi during the 17th annual BRICS summit on July 6, 2025.
 AP Photo/Silvia Izquierdo
